summary.span: 包含可用來編碼字串的方法，以協助您保護應用程式免於跨網站指令碼 (XSS) 攻擊與 LDAP 插入式攻擊的威脅。

span.span: Contains methods that you can use to encode strings in order help you protect your application against cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and LDAP injection attacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼演算法尋找相關的一組字元，會被視為安全，而且所有其他字元編碼。The encoding algorithms look for a prescribed set of characters that are considered safe and encode all other characters. （這有時候稱為 「 安全清單 」 或 「 允許清單 」。）(This is sometimes referred to as "safe-listing" or "whitelisting.")
